      • expand

        public static String expand(String uuid)
        Expands a shortened version of a UUID.

        Every UUID has 2 forms. Each form is unique. However, it is simpler to store UUIDs in short form and expand them into long form when needed.

        Example long form: ed5f12cd-6007-45d9-a4b9-940524ddaecf
        Example short form: ed5f12cd600745d9a4b9940524ddaecf

        This method does not parse the UUID. See expandAndParse(String) or UUID.fromString(String) for a full UUID object.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the string based short uuid
        Returns:
        the lengthened uuid string

      • expandAndParse

        public static UUID expandAndParse(String uuid)
        Equivalent to calling UUID.fromString(UUIDUtil.expand(uuid))

        See expand(String) for details
        Parameters:
        uuid - the short uuid string
        Returns:
        a parsed UUID
